title: Blood, Love, Magick
description: Life’s a witch!Aurora is the heir to her coven and as the next priestess it is her responsibility to keep the treaty between vampires and witches. What she didn’t factor into the equation was falling for the enemy. If anyone finds out who Aurora is meeting in the shadows, her life and her coven will be in jeopardy. Now that she has everything she ever wanted, Aurora has everything to lose.
author: J.L. Weil
